ygData.subject: The X-Predacons hope
ygData.msgSnippet: Braxus 2, the dark desolate world that is being used by the X-Predacons as their secret base. Not above ground, but below it. Deep inside the planet in a large

Subject: The X-Predacons hope

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Braxus 2, the dark desolate world that is being used by the X-Predacons as 
their secret base. Not above ground, but below it. Deep inside the planet in 
a large military installation large ships are being built day in and day out, 
preparing for the day in which they may need to defend the final X-Predacon 
safe place from the Infecticons. On another part of the planet a large ship 
sits, with X-Predacon troops all around it. Inside it, scientists stand 
around working on a massive machine that makes up approximately one half of 
the ship. As they do the X-Predacon leader stands behind them waiting 
paitiently for their report. Finally one of the scientists walks up to him 
and salutes him.

Scientist: "Sir, we have finished the device. With it this ship will be able 
to warp to any place in the universe during any time period. Might I add you 
also made us place three times the firepower on this ship then you do with 
other ships this size. Im suprised theres still room for the crew and the 
Vile Pods..."

????: "Who cares what you think!? Now that you have finished with the device 
I want you and everyone else's monkey skid plates off this ship in five 
minutes before I lay the smack down on you!"

The scientist nods and begins to step away slowly from the leader before the 
leader transforms into a hand and slams down onto the scientist. With the 
scientist pinned between its fingers the robotic hand fligns him into a wall 
with a sickeding thud before two finger tips are sent at the scientist 
blowing him to tiny bits. The hand then transforms into robot mode as the 
other scientists just move back and away from him.

Gigatron: "Why are you standing there you jabronies!? Get your monkey skid 
plates off this damn ship before I lay the smacketh down on you too!"

With that all of the scientists all run out of the room and in a matter of 
minutes the ship is empty aside from Gigatron and the Vile Force.  Gigatron 
walks back and forth infront of the Vile Force before he stands in front of 
them again.

Gigatron: "Now it is time for you jabronies to go back in time and layeth the 
smackdown on all those Preds and Maximals back on Prehistoric Earth before 
the timeline can be changed. I would go myself but I must lay the smackdown 
on these new guys that have invaded our Galaxy. This ship has a transwarp 
communicator so you will be able to contact this base at any time. Good luck."

The Vile Force all nod and each member hits his chest quickly. Gigatron 
laughs and then leaves the ship as its systems power up. The door to the ship 
soon closes and the large ship rises into the sky and begins to glow. Inside 
the ships cockpit Vile stands infront of Gemini 2 and Methos, two members of 
the Vile Force and nods to them.

Vile: "For Gigatron and our future!"

Elsewhere Skywarp and Cyanide stand infront of the massive Machine that will 
allow the ship to travel through time and space with ease. And still 
meanwhile in the cargo hold infront of a scorpion like machine, Gemini 1 and 
Destruction sit down playing poker. The cards begin to shake as the ship 
glows brighter in the sky lighting the ground below.

Gemini 1: "Here we go!"

And just as that is said the ship dissapears from sight. Back in time, above 
the Destructocons and Predacons assaulting the trainers base, a massive 
portal opens, bright light falling onto the base itself and the men outside 
it.

--part1_c9.10b7e8b3.2849467a_boundary
